channel.title: The Trip
channel.description:
[quote] [b][u]Voyage 34:[/u][/b] The time is 9:00 pm, one hour after the participants have eaten sugar cubes saturated with LSD. We hear Brian and his fellow travelers observing their gradual transformation.﻿
[People talking and laughing.]
---
Brian's been amusing his friends by chewing on some plastic flashbulbs.
[People talking nonsense and laughing.]
---
Brian's mood is gradually changing. He orders all of his friends into another room and closes the door. He sits alone on the wooden floor, visible only by the dim light shining from the bathroom. He talks to himself.
---
The time is now 1 am. Brian is unable to snap his fingers and terminate the trip, which continues.
He sobs, as his joy turns to fear.
---
Brian's rocky journey ended twelve hours after it so innocently had begun. He was shattered by it.
This young man never had a bummer in some thirty-three LSD trips. Every one of them was a delight. Everything under control. He needed only to snap his fingers and down he came, any time. But on Voyage 34 he finally met himself coming down an up-staircase and the encounter was crushing. ﻿ [/quote] [u] [Porcupine Tree -' Voyage 34 - the complete trip' Phase I][/u] [b] hello, and welcome to the unofficial-official drug trips thread :stuck_out_tongue: I, being 16 and living in Israel, never had one. but anyone that had something interesting\funny\wierd happening to them while high are welcome to share it here, i think drunk is OK too, anyway, go for it :stuck_out_tongue: [/b]

item.title: The Trip
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
NO. On topic my bong:


His name is LeBong James

I smoke weed pretty frequently (during school 2-4 times a week and during summer/school breaks close to everyday). I usually go out with friends and we hotbox with my bong or hit up a party. Probs the craziest thing thats happened to me was back during the summer I saw inception with my girlfriend and we were both mad blazed. I got sooo immersed into the movie that afterwards i felt like i was in a dream and i started to do all the crazy shit in the movie, but i realised that i had ended up in limbo and started freakin out until my girlfriend snapped me outta it. I get drunk alot too, but only mainly at parties so theres not really much to tell besides the generic drunk party stories.

btw im 16.

Read full topic

item.title: The Trip
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Fancy Pants:

you can’t be physically addicted to marijuana. if you’re psychologically addicted, you’re probably just a fucking idiot.

Anything that makes you feel better than average is addicting. Some things are harder to get addicted to than others though.

Read full topic

item.title: The Trip
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
sersoft:

I enjoy making people feel better about themselves cause they think I’m bound to fail in life due to a marijuana addiction.

You have a better chance to fail in school if you’re addicted to video games or music.

I never said you were going to fail because you smoke pot. I never even thought it. More likely you’ll get arrested for “finding” something and end up getting more jail time because you tried to resist!

Just kidding

I know some drugs have serious side effects if used even once, and others have next to none, if not none, and weed is one of the latter, and that’s mostly what you do, so I’m honestly not too worried about you Sersoft.

It’s a lifestyle choice. I choose not to drink, smoke, or do drugs. I am happy without any of them. Not to say that I would never do any of them, but I am fine with saving my money by not doing any of them.

Read full topic

imo 90% of people who get psychologically addicted to weed or anything not physically addictive are idiots, don’t take it so personally

some strains can smell entirely different than other ones. you really have no idea.
